extractRowFromHeatMapDataset

public static XYDataset extractRowFromHeatMapDataset(HeatMapDataset dataset,
                                                     int row,
                                                     java.lang.Comparable seriesName)
Returns a dataset containing one series that holds a copy of the (x, z) data from one row (y-index) of the specified dataset.

Parameters:
dataset - the dataset (null not permitted).
row - the row (y) index.
seriesName - the series name/key (null not permitted).
Returns:
The dataset.

Parameters:

column - the column (x) index.

createHeatMapImage

public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage createHeatMapImage(HeatMapDataset dataset,
                                                              PaintScale paintScale)
Creates an image that displays the values from the specified dataset.

Parameters:
dataset - the dataset (null not permitted).
paintScale - the paint scale for the z-values (null not permitted).
Returns:
A buffered image.
